title: Creamy lemon chicken with pasta
ingredients: ['3 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '1 lemon, quartered', '2 teaspoons garlic granules, divided', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper, divided', '800ml chicken stock', '4 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '225g rotelle pasta or any other pasta shape you prefer', '250ml double cream', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest']
